Class coffeeRecipe.coffeeBuilder

java.lang.Object
java0825_builder2.coffeeRecipe.coffeeBuilder
Enclosing class:
coffeeRecipe
public static class coffeeRecipe.coffeeBuilder extends Object
coffeeBuilder 클래스는 coffeeRecipe 객체를 생성하기 위한 빌더 클래스입니다.
